original_text: But Joshua the son of Nun, and Caleb the son of Jephunneh, which were of the men that went to search the land, lived still.
korean_text: 그 땅을 정탐하러 갔던 사람들 중에서 오직 눈의 아들 여호수아와 여분네의 아들 갈렙은 생존하니라

sentences.original_text: But Joshua the son of Nun
and Caleb the son of Jephunneh
which were of the men that went to search the land
sentences.korean_translation: 땅을 정탐하러 갔던 사람들 중에 있었는데
